title: spawnpoint
description: Sets the spawn point for a player.

fields.title: player
fields.description: A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

fields.title: spawnPos
fields.description: A `vector` [x y z] of `floats` that defines the player's new spawn point.
